Row.Text: It is divine will that I should be queen, and that his kingdom should extend over the earth. Is it yours?
I am Isabella, queen of these lands. The queen is right. The queen is always right.

I covet not your lands and your crown for my own sake, but for the sake of God's empire. Which is mine.
I, who sought to extend God's grace across the land, am to be cast out. To live amongst pig farmers and… what is the word… bakers!
Yes, yes, yes, send it to my scribe and he will put my seal upon it. Now go away.
